name: It's Just A PacMan Game
description:
"It's Just A PacMan Game", alternatively, you can call it "Gelbeeck" but that name will be used for something else.

 Basically collect ALL the dots/Gelbeeck's Nutrition and you'll learn how to win.

Edit 05/01/2020: If you feel the game is too hard, try not to eat all the big dots at once. Eat all the small ones first and leave the big ones behind. Eventually you'll get used to the game and be able to eat all of the big dots at once.

5 identical stages

1-2 hours of playtime excluding Stage 5, it's quite unpredictable.

 Controls Instructions are in-game.

Art/Programming by Rosziv:

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/AV_Sakuma
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUsDmjAry3Y2qcHbnJl0N5w

Music by Rhythmitis:

  • Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/4ZpaUq4YjkiZzPk1mJ3Czi?si=BuGxSf4dT7WG46l6yWjkbg
  • Instagram: https://instagram.com/rhythmitis

Free Resources used:

  • https://pixabay.com/photos/scroll-document-frames-paper-tape-69518/
  • https://www.fontspace.com/konstantine-studio/tropical-asian-demo
  • https://www.fontspace.com/%C3%A6nigma-fonts/edit-undo-brk

Some Audioclips are from MK4 and SFV.

Okay, there's not much special about this game. Outside of aesthetics, I think mechanically, there are two things that are different but I still enjoyed making this. I definitely did not have the time to be original but I'll admit I could have done a few things better but this game was already taking up too much of my time. My eyes hurt , I'm lacking hours of sleep and I have forgotten how to engage in social interaction haha. I do wish I could fix some of the issues here but I decided to just accept it as a loss and move on for now, like this is literally the second game I have completed and I just have to deal with the fact that I'm still a novice at all this gamedev stuff. Just discovered I can't even get the fullscreen working in WebGl. :(

This PacMan Clone was meant to test the idea for another PacMan Clone. I didn't really want to make this game but after finishing the basic PacMan stuff, I felt I could add a tiny bit more and make a small mini-game for the next 3 days and just share it . That was 3 weeks ago :|

I feel slightly bad for spending a lot more time on this than needed but I also don't feel bad because I...actually can't feel anything right now haha. I suggest downloading the standalone version, it is better. The Web version works fine but also...it doesn't. Irregardless of errors and stuttering, I hope you enjoy the game or else I cry like baby. Also I made a youtube video, it's cool just like you compadre.

Send Bugs or HighScores to my twitter or here if you can comment, don't know how itch works.
